collection_endpoint.description: Collection-specific endpoint used to submit index, search, and data upload requests to an OpenSearch Serverless collection.

dashboard_endpoint.description: Collection-specific endpoint used to access OpenSearch Dashboards.

failure_code.description: A failure code associated with the collection.

failure_message.description: A failure reason associated with the collection.

kms_key_arn.description: The ARN of the Amazon Web Services KMS key used to encrypt the collection.

last_modified_date.description: Date the Collection was last modified.

region.description: Region where this resource will be [managed](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/general/latest/gr/rande.html#regional-endpoints). Defaults to the Region set in the [provider configuration](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/hashicorp/aws/latest/docs#aws-configuration-reference).

standby_replicas.description: Indicates whether standby replicas should be used for a collection.
